#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int test,k;
    string stra,strb;
    cin>>test;
    while(test--)
    {
        cin>>stra>>strb;
        k=stra.find(strb);
        if(k>=0 && k<stra.length())
            cout<<1<<endl;
        else
            cout<<0<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
